name: Arkanoid_shit
description:
A quickly cherished poop.Not the worst smelling made during #MiBJam...

What i may should fix :

collision bugs

add some title screen/music

add vilain spawning

add a boss

I'm ok with rendering and stick quite well with original bonuses. It's not fun to play because of bugs and the room is too large.
